name: Retro 9
description:
Retro 9 is a game that contain multi mini addictive games built in retro style with Leaderboards !

The game is completely built solo by me in 2 days for GDevelop weekend jam #1

Hope you like it💖

You can also play the game on liluo.io 

https://liluo.io/vegetato/retro-9

Credits: Main menu: SOUND AIRYLUVS by ISAo https://airyluvs.com/ Lose SFX|Dodge the rocks: Spring https://opengameart.org/content/the-king-of-hell-final-boss-theme Press'em: Centurion_of_war https://opengameart.org/content/neon-breakdownsemi-retro Left Right: Magnesus https://opengameart.org/content/retro-16-bit-music-tracks Paulina Riva https://opengameart.org/content/sky-background Composed by: Jon K. Fite https://opengameart.org/content/victory-2
